From the brand

ABOUT US

romision is dedicated to bring you a touch of warmth in cold winter. It is designed for your comfort and warmth, ease of mobility without any bound feeling. We adapt Newest 24-Hour Constant Temperature Technology into material to give your skin ultrasoft feeling.

DESIGNED FOR SPORTS

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 3.94 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 14.89 Ounces
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé September 14, 2020
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B08HV6RCQH

Pull On closure
Machine Wash
„ÄêAll Day Warm & Comfortable„Äë Our heated thermals for men is made of 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, providing enhanced warmth and insulation. Thus it minimizes heat loss and regulate your body temperature in the cold winter. The tightly closed knitted seams, super Skin-touch and Ultra Soft mens long johns fit snug like a second skin for keeping the cold air out and preserving heat effectively. Keep you Warm and Comfy All Day!
„ÄêSuperior Moisture Wicking„Äë Made of Breathable and Quick-drying fiber perfect to absorb sweat and dry fast in exercise. romision long underwear mens is 60% Higher absorbent than other mens thermals. With moisture transport system and odor control function men thermal underwear set, keep you dry and light, easily absorb the unpleasant smell during workout and keep away from the clammy feeling. You can relax or brave the outdoors pursuing your active lifestyle at any time.
„ÄêExcellent Flexibility for Any Movement„Äë The mens long johns thermal set is designed with 4-way stretch compression, its strong seams won‚Äôt tearing while keeping elasticity. Mens long underwear add range of motion and offer maximum support for body, you‚Äôll feel a sense of freedom in all activities. Besides, designed to increase the amount of oxygen in the blood, our mens base layer can improve blood circulation, protect you from muscle injury and great for outdoor activities.
„ÄêSuit For Any Occasions„Äë Heated base layer men cold weather with classic round neck design, can be worn inside or outside. You can even use it like pajamas stay at home or sports suit go for a walk outside if you wish and no one knows you have worn thermal underwear men it‚Äôs so hip. It is the best mens thermals top and bottom set in cold weather to keep you warm and comfy during skiing, running, jogging, hiking, hunting, walking the dog.
„ÄêWarm Gift for Him„Äë Every man would like to receive such a comfortable and warm men long johns thermal set in cold weather. This thermal for men comes with fleece lining and lightweight provided excellent keep warm performance and windproof function. Wear within a few seconds, you will feel your body heat being trapped inside of the top and bottom. With romision winter underwear thermal men, giving your Lover/Son/Father lasting and warm love during the cold morning.

Heated Thermal Underwear for Men, Fleece Base Layer Men Winter Gear Compression

As the weather gets colder, you want to make you're protected from the cold with mens thermal long johns. They will keep you warm and dry with their moisture-wicking properties, and the snug fit will retain body heat. It will offer full mobility throughout the day.

Compared to other materials, this long underwear for men with excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.

Thanksgiving Gifts for Father, Husband, Boyfriend, Son


I think your father, lover, son, and friends all need such a 24-hour constant temperature mens thermal sets. Don‚Äôt forget to buy one for yourself! When they receive this heart-warming gift, I think they will laugh happily and can't wait to try it on.

Details of romision Thermal Underwear Set

  1. Offer Full Flexibility and Body Movement

    4 Way Stretch High Elasticity

    The mens base layer set is designed with four way stretch fabric, which have high elasticity, increasing the range of motion and provide your body with the greatest degree of freedom and support.


  2. 24 Hours Keep You Warm In Cold Weather

    Fleece Lined

    • Mens thermal underwear set is made of 92% Ultra-Soft Polyester + 8% Spandex blend fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, the insulation material which can lock your body heat well.
    • The super skin-touch and ultra soft long johns for men fit snug like a second skin for minimizing heat loss and keep you warm in the cold winter.


  3. Exquisite Stictching

    Clever Seams & Durable

    Neat and flat sutures, clear and meticulous routing. The well-made four-pin six-wire process, avoids friction between the clothing and the skin. At the same time prevents static electricity.


  4. 2 Way Air Circulation Design Prevent Body Odor

    Sweat Wicking & Quick Dry

    Excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.


  5. Casual and Sport Wear

    Crew Neck & Not Exposed

    Classic round neck design, can be worn inside and outside, more personal and warm, suitable for any combination.


  6. Provide a Full Range of Freedom

    Excellent Elasticity

    Elastic Band at the waist to keep the pants from Being Loose, Suitable for men of All Shapes

NO MORE OLD-SCHOOL SCRATCHY INSULATED UNDERWEAR: Traditional cotton long underwear are simply scratchy and uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time, Rocky thermals are made from a soft, comfy polyester blend so you can enjoy all-day comfort, and your winter adventures never have to end
FLEECE-LINED COMFORT (WITHOUT THE BULK): Don‚Äôt let the lightweight fabric fool you, thanks to the fleece-lined design, this thermal underwear set gives you high-quality warmth that fans say keep them warmer than traditional puffy thermals or wool base layers that leave you feeling strangled or trapped
NO MORE AWKWARD ADJUSTING THANKS TO ELASTIC SEAMS: Check out the pictures and see how this women‚Äôs thermal underwear set is crafted using elastic seems that keep tops and bottoms from falling down or bunching up (even on long walks to school), and if your family enjoys skiing, snowboarding, or ice skating then Rocky makes a great base layer — but without the sagging and ‚Äòawkward adjustments‚Äô
MACHINE WASHABLE FOR EASY CLEANUP: While cheap Thermal Underwear unravel in the washing machine after only a few cycles, Rocky uses high-quality stitching for thermal leggings and long sleeve shirts that stand up to the washer — even with super-active days and many muddy adventures

Price: $54.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:06 UTC – Details)


A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it. In Mysterium, one player takes on the role of the ghost and over the course of a week, tries to lead the investigators to their culprit. Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you? Can the psychics determine the weapon, location and killer or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder? Contents: 6 Intuition tokens, 6 sleeves, 6 clairvoyance level markers, 36 clairvoyance tokens, clock board, 4 progress boards, 18 character psychic cards, 18 location psychic cards, 18 object psychic cards, sand timer, 18 character ghost cards, 18 location ghost cards, 18 object ghost, 6 ghost tokens, 84 vision cards, 6 culprit tokens, 3 crow markers, clairvoyance track; rulebook. In the 1920’s, Mr. MacDowell, a gifted astrologist, entered in his new house when he immediately detected a supernatural being. Gathering eminent mediums of his time for an extraordinary s√©ance, they will have 7 hours to contact the ghost and investigate to unlock an old mystery. Unable to talk, the amnesic ghost will communicate with the mediums through visions (illustrated cards). They will have to decipher the images to help the ghost remember how he was murdered (who? where? which weapon?). The more they cooperate and guess, well, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit. This party game is one of the most anticipated games, thanks to innovative, thrilling and immersive features. It offers cooperation and investigation with an asymmetrical gameplay. While playing the ghost or a medium, you will have fun trying to guess what other players have in their minds! So enter in this strange manor and let yourself be led by your intuition.
MYSTERY BOARD GAME: A horrible crime was committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor thirty years ago. Now the mansion is haunted by the ghost of the murdered servant and it‚Äôs up to a group of psychic investigators to get to the bottom of the mystery.
COOPERATIVE BOARD GAME: One player takes on the role of the victim (who is now a ghost) and the rest play as psychics. Over the course of the game, players work together to solve a mystery by psychically communicating with the victim. The ghost tries to lead psychics to the correct culprit.
INTERPRET VISIONS TO SOLVE MYSTERIES: Each player investigates a case assigned to them to determine who the actual murderer is. Psychics receive numerous visions from the ghost with clues. Can they determine the weapon, location and killer, or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?
HIGH VARIABILITY: Dozens of different suspects, weapons and locations ensure no two games are the same! LOOKING FOR A NEW CHALLENGE? Expansion sets are available (Expansions require base game to play).

Read more

A horrible crime has been committed on the grounds of Warwick Manor and it’s up to the psychic investigators to get to the bottom of it.

In Mysterium, one player tries to lead the investigators to their culprit.

Each night the team will be met with visions, but what is the ghost trying to tell you?

Can the psychics determine the weapon, location, and identity of the murderer?

Or will a violent criminal pull off the perfect murder?

  • Who?
  • Where?
  • What weapon?

The more players cooperate, the easier it will be to the catch the right culprit!

Each player must investigate a case assigned to them, determining if the clues lead to the actual murderer.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Light Bulbs

Outdoor LED Spotlight

Outdoor Lamp

EDISHINE has been focusing on the unity of practicality and decorativeness. Dedicated to banish the darkness and bring light to millions of families, while making your living space more beautiful and cozy. Specializing in indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures such as floor lamps, pendant lamps, table lamps, ceiling lamps, wall lamps, floodlights and more, meeting all your lighting needs from spacious front door to narrow bedside table.

„ÄêFlexible & Stable„ÄëEquipped with 6ft SJTW 18/3C extension cord, this outdoor plug in flood light is flexible enough to offer greater installation range without extra extension cord, easy for you to plug it into any polarized outlet; the included ground stake helps to keep fixture more stable
„ÄêEasy to Install & Adjustable Head„ÄëJust use the screw and nut cap to connect the ground stake, then put your bulb (not included) into the socket; you can adjust the direction of the flood light head by adjusting the screw to change the direction of the light, meet your different illumination needs
„ÄêE26 Socket„Äë E26 base only supports maximum of 150W PAR38 bulbs (bulbs not included); with high quality ceramic lamp base, our outdoor flood light fixture is high temperature resistance and durable, eliminating the hassle of frequent bulb replacement and saving your money
„ÄêWide Application & Warranty„ÄëThe outdoor flood light holders have passed the wet location test, can be used in humid environments and weather, ideal for yard, patio, flag, holiday decor; UL listed and 1-Year Warranty provided, our service team is always glad to help you within 24 hours





EDISHINE is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement and Indoor & Outdoor Lightings. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products, A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

Suitable for Any Weather

Lately, it feels like we‚Äôre all just dinosaurs trying to avoid the falling meteors. In this 2-4 player game, you‚Äôll try to dodge all of life‚Äôs little disasters while tuning out your incredibly rude inner demons. You might fall into a pit of hot lava or get ghosted by your dino date. But think happy thoughts because the dino who survives it all wins the game!
Lately, it feels like we‚Äôre all just dinosaurs trying to avoid the falling meteors.
In this 2-4 player game, you‚Äôll try to dodge all of life‚Äôs little disasters while tuning out your incredibly rude inner demons. You might fall into a pit of hot lava or get ghosted by your dino date. But think happy thoughts because the dino who survives it all wins the game!
Happy Little Dinosaurs takes 30-60 minutes to play and is for 2-4 players. It is recommended for ages 8+.
The box contains 97 cards, 4 Dinosaur player boards, 4 Dinosaur meeples, and 1 rule book.

In Happy Little Dinosaurs, the first person to reach 50 points, or be the last Dinosaur standing, wins the game! During each round, you‚Äôll flip a Disaster card featuring a Natural, Predatory, or Emotional disaster. Each player will play a Point card in hopes of collecting points and avoiding the disaster. Will you successfully dodge the disasters or get eaten by a prehistoric whale? Only the cards can decide‚Ä¶

Disaster Cards

In Happy Little Dinosaurs, you will work to keep your chin up while avoiding all of life‚Äôs little disasters. If you collect 3 Disaster cards of the same type OR 3 different types of Disaster cards, you will be out of the game.

Point Cards and Instant Cards

Point cards feature weapons, trinkets, and good luck charms that you use to collect points and avoid disasters. Each card has a point value between 0 and 9 that you will use when scoring a round. You can use Instant cards at different points during the game to tip the odds in your favor or save your Dinosaur from certain death.

Player Boards

Player boards include your Dinosaur's traits, an Escape Route you use to track your score, and a Disaster Area where you will collect Disaster cards.

Meeples

You'll move your Dinosaur meeple along the Escape Route on your player board to track your score.

Disaster Cards

Point Cards and Instant Cards

Player Boards

Meeples

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $299.00 - $255.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:56 UTC – Details)


1.SYLVOX 24-inch DC flat-screen TV, built-in DVD player, with a base, and high-resolution digital noise, suitable for RVs travel and home use.
2 .10.5V~28V full range wide voltage protection, which can effectively deal with the influence of unstable power supply voltage in the car on the TV when the RV starts and stops. Support DC voltage 12v/24v power supply, or use the attached adapter to connect to a home AC voltage 110v power supply.
With anti-reverse connection technology, when the positive and negative poles of the DC power supply are reversed, the TV will not be short-circuited, which effectively protects the TV.
3.Built-in dual 5W speaker cabinet , to provide high-quality sound. The square base bracket is earthquake-resistant . Designed for light motorhomes, caravans, motorhomes, boats, bedrooms, kitchens and home use
4 .HDMI and USB port for connection to USB or hard drive for recording and playback program file, or through the HDMI connection VAST box or media player. With a built-in DVD player, you can watch your favorite movies.
5. One-key scanning: Sylvox RV TV can be easily used in mobile environments such as boats and RVs . A simple function- SCAN is added to the remote control . When moving to a new location, just press the “Scan” button, and the TV will pass and retune to the new location and get all the channels in the new area.

We include a 100-240V adapter and a 12V cigarette lighter, so you can power it directly from a 12V socket, or you can power it throgh the adapter in the bedroom, kitchen.
The square base bracket has good shock resistance and can withstand bumps, potholes, and uneven roads.

Specification:
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 HD
Tuner: ATSC
Connection method: USB HDMI VGA
Voltage range: 10.5-28V DC
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 220 cd/m2
Wall mount VESA : 100 x 100mm
Product size: 548.78*48.60*366.26mm
Standard: ATSC
Refresh rate: 60Hz
Power: 34w
Viewing angle: 178¬∞H/178¬∞V
Weight: 3.2Kg
Ports: EARPHONE, DC, HDMI, VGA, PC AUDIO, AV, YPBPR, AUDIO OUT, TV, COAX, USB
Accessories: remote control (including battery), power cable, adapter, square base, screws, manual, cigarette lighter.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.
Multiple Protection Design : Full HD TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 10.5V-28V ) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed)
Excellent experience: 12 volt TV Built-in DVD, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, HDMI, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178¬∞H/178¬∞V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter and other accessories.
Use place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers with, trailers, RVs and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges and other places of the perfect TV, through the included adapter to convert the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieve home use effect.
Anti-seismic design, passed the 4G vibration test.6 pin DC port Anti-drop design, the plug is not easy to fall in the process of vibration.
High-definition TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 Full HD picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and light weight body. High-performance 16 : 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.

SYLVOX is the brand of an American company that provides quality products and services to tens of millions of users worldwide.

Excellent Shape and Size : A spot-on size is really important, our mouse pad measures approximately 9.4 x 8.3 inches(L X W), 0.9 inch thick. It fit for almose all kind of Mouses. You can move the mouse around easily and the pad shapes it well. Moreover, the reinforced edges can efficiently prevent deformation and damage to guarantee long time use.
Environmental Material : Made of soft smooth breathable material and non-deformable momory form, it is no-toxic, no any chemicals safe to use. More important, unlike other moused pads on the market, our mouse pads have no any bad smells!
Endless Comfortness : Applies non-slip PU rubber base, this mouse pad will firmly grasp your desk without any chance of sliding or unwanted movement for the mouse pad, so you can better focus your attention when working or studying.
Protects Your Wrists : With raised ergonomic soft memory form design, it will provide good touch and effective support to your wrist. Keep arms, wrists, and hands from getting sore while using the computer, maximum reduce wrist stress and tiredness.
